attributes.action: Allow students to have Mondays and Wednesdays off school.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Students need more days off school, 5 days of school is too much!
Some may think that children need these 5 days to learn and they will become poor and homeless when they're older. This cannot be farther from the truth. Students can gain information from other resorces such as The internet, books and television.
I propose that Wednesday and Monday should be removed from school slots and become a day off school.
Do not delay, the future of children is in your hands!
